title: Could my dentist have closed a tooth with an open nerve?
self_text: Two weeks ago I went to the dentist. He had to fix and close a cavity. I was told that the operation was very urgent because the cavities were deep and I would have risked devitalizing the tooth.  The problem is that I think the dentist, while removing the cavities, went too deep and under covered/hit the nerve of the tooth. While operating I could feel that feeling of "nakedness" and pain, but I was not sure it was my nerve discovered. But the dentist didnâ€™t say anything and proceeded to close my tooth. I have had an infernal pain in my tooth for two weeks now, itâ€™s the same feeling as a dental abscess but without any noticeable swelling. I suppose the reason is the one I just described, but I donâ€™t know if Iâ€™m right, or the dentist did everything in order and the pain is caused by some other problem of mine.  Now, I wanted to know if it is possible that a dentist could have made such a mistake without realizing it, what would be the consequences of such an action and what should I do to fix it?  ​  16, AFAB, no smoke, no alchol, 5'5, around 155 pounds, don't take any particular medication

title: would you take the pill or not, if no, would you protest, or would you sell the pill (description for info)
self_text: Scientists have made a pill that, when consumed, causes the user's mind to go into a sort of a blank box, almost like a dream, that scientists can control how long they are out in, essentially work breaks in a pill form, but you wake up exactly as when the pill took effect. So 20 minutes of break = 5 seconds in real life  If you choose to sell the pill, you  can  make the pill very addictive. You can make a lot of money, but there is a 0.001% chance that the user gets trapped in the blank box for a very long time, scientist report that this amount of time is around 6 times the length of all of time itself. You know this is torture, but the amount of money is astounding, and the pill is sold under the same name as the company who first produced the pill, so there is no way of getting caught.  TLDR: earn lots of money off of an addictive pill you sell to others, but the pill can make you get trapped in your own head, for 6x the total length of time(not the length of time of the pill, the lengthbof all of time in the universe, so millions and billions of years of just yoyr consciousness). Also you wont get caught  View Poll

title: How do I eat mochi
self_text: I know this is definitely a stupid question even if this is nostupidquestions but how do I eat mochi.   I bought some sober and am now very not sober and I realized I don't know if it needs to be cooked. And if I google "how to eat mochi" it just says "Take a bite, plop the entire mochi ice cream ball into your mouth, cut them into piecesâ€”the possibilities are endless. One of the most popular ways to eat mochi ice cream is on the go! Grab a mochi ice cream treat and head out the door." Which tells me that mochi can be bit, cut and grabbed not if it needs to be cooked.   It looks like ice cream with a squishy powdery outside that looks like it would be good under the  blow torch, but I'm not sober enough for that. Does it need to be toasted, put in the oven, deep fried, or heated in any way or can I eat them now.

title: I realize this is incredibly specific, but... Where can I find a plain pillowcase that is 33" long and 15" wide?

I just have two slightly longer than usual pillows I've had for years and can't for the life of me, find a new pillowcase that fits them.  Edit: Solved! title: Am I the only one who finds the McDonalds UK adverts annoying?
self_text: I find the overly-familiar, somewhat working class  "Jack the lad"/"cheeky chappy" tone of the voice actor really quite irritating, in terms of I instantly change the radio or TV station when he comes on.  In a way I think it's a bit presumptuous about the demographic/mentality of the typical McDonalds customer so quite condescending actually. They're clearly targeting the "chav"/working class male demographic in my opinion, for lack of a better term.  The voice has grated on me for years, but I've only just really analysed why. They've kept the same voice actor for years and years so they must think his schtick works, but for me it just reinforces my perception of McDonalds being a really down market place.

title: Can providers give a range of mobile connectivity?
self_text: I live in Australia (if that affects the answer) but was wondering if I can request from my mobile provider for a range of internet speed and connectivity? I live in an area that has 4g coverage and regularly travel to 5g locations but often experience extremely slow speeds. I have asked them about my speeds and have been given the troubleshoot option to reset network connectivity to increase my speed but when I asked if there was a range on speeds in my area I should be getting I was told my speeds depend on the phone I use and if there was maintenance in my area. I have a samsung 21 ultra so speeds through my device shouldn't be an issue and have was told there was no maintenance for my area so I was just wondering when/if/how I can press the issue of my slow speeds, I am paying for a 500g a month plan and don't get to use as much as I otherwise would due to internet going slow/dropping out but don't really know if there are standards they should be held to.

title: If anyone knows: How long do valley fever spores persist on inanimate surfaces?
self_text: Probably an extremely silly thing to ask but I live in an endemic area and accidentally fell asleep during a recent dust storm with my window open (whoops) and now basically every object and surface in the room is coated with fine, gritty dust.   I have some immune system issues so I was concerned whether this could potentially be a risk as I know people often contract valley fever / coccidioidomycosis through dust exposureâ€” and if it is, whether the spores can just â€˜die offâ€™/be nonviable after a bit or if I have to do some thorough cleaning or disinfecting in here to prevent the risk of me contracting it

title: my sad and sweet dream last night..
self_text: last night i had a dream i bought a little shop in a mall to turn in to a juice and tea spot. i fixed it up with my familyâ€™s help. i was selling 2 different sandwiches and organic drinks, juices and teas. for some reason, i decided to build behind the counter a door leading to two bedrooms and two bathrooms. there was a big parade happening in the mall on opening night where people were dressed up and there were bands. my grandfather was there and brought a ham and was making pulled pork sandwiches. everyone was lined up to have one and papa was so happy. he died the next day. i couldnâ€™t remember how to properly make the ham how to flavor it which made me sad because i was unable to ask him how to make it anymore.   i had another girl working there with me that i hired and she ended up changing my juice recipe without me knowing and two people were digusted by it. they also saw that we were using tap water to make the juice and mentioned that it was contaminated and needed to be filtered or boiled before using. i told them to come back for free juice as i would fix the issues. they both said no in their own way. i went the older lady who was horrified and told her that if she ever needed anything, if she was ever hungry or thirsty and needed help to come to me as i grabbed her hands.   i closed up shop that night and saw that there was a homeless man sleeping in the outdoor eating bench. i told him he should wash and sleep here for the night in one of the rooms and i made him a sandwich. he had a kid but the kid was not with him. i remember being worried he would think it was a permanent situation. i offered  that maybe he can help around shop for food and shelter until he was able to find a job and home.  irl my grandfathers health & memory is degrading fast and i am living away from him. he is a huge people person & very kind, and i learned it from him. he also loves pork lol. i have been drinking the tap water here for a while too and oddly it tasted funny today i didnâ€™t even make the correlation until right now.   canâ€™t really piece the dream together for meaning so i just thought iâ€™d share if anyone was bored & wanted a read or to help interpret ðŸ’—
